event.head: Modelling
event.desc:
To convert and represent the information in a 3D reconstruction. In doing the model, each step implies choices about the representation and prioritisation of data in the sources. Consequently, it should be declared how this data is used and it should be clear that different methods highlight different aspects, responding to different research questions. Based on the aims and research questions, decisions (and clear statements) are needed on:
the scale (1:1 is best)
the level of details (e.g. all architectural details or just the volume)
textures (procedural or mapping with a picture)
lighting and shading (atmospherical, internal/external, time of the day, seasonality, etc.)
soundscapes (specific audio, e.g. winds, acoustic of the building)
annotations
links to original sources: how are they connected and how is possible to verify the accuracy of the model
